#!/bin/ash
# Purpur Installation Script v4 - Full Private & Public Plugin Deployment

# --- Log Start ---
echo "INFO: Starting advanced server installation..."

# --- Preamble: Install necessary tools ---
# Added 'git' for cloning private repositories
apk add --no-cache curl jq git

# --- Step 1: Download the Purpur Server JAR ---
PROJECT=purpur
echo "INFO: Determining latest Purpur version..."
# Using your existing logic to get the correct Purpur JAR
if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "INFO: Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
    VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT} | jq -r --arg VERSION $MINECRAFT_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep true`
    LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT} | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
    if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
        MINECRAFT_VERSION=${MINECRAFT_VERSION}
    else
        MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
    fi
    BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT}/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds.all | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep true`
    LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT}/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds.latest'`
    if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
        BUILD_NUMBER=${BUILD_NUMBER}
    else
        BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
    fi
    JAR_NAME=${PROJECT}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar
    DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT}/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/${BUILD_NUMBER}/download
fi
echo "INFO: Downloading Purpur from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -L -o /mnt/server/${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

# --- Step 2: Download Server Properties if Needed ---
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kylegroves6/Pelican-Egg-Configs/refs/heads/main/Eggs/Minecraft/Purpur/Purpur-for-Velocity/server.properties
fi

# --- Step 3: Clear Old Plugins & Prepare Directory ---
echo "INFO: Clearing old plugin JARs to ensure a clean installation..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins
rm -f /mnt/server/plugins/*.jar

# --- Step 4: Clone Your Complete Plugin Library ---
PRIVATE_REPO="private-mc-plugins" # <-- ‼️ CHANGE THIS if your private repo has a different name
echo "INFO: Cloning complete plugin library from private repository..."
# Uses the secure variables you created in the egg
git clone https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/${GITHUB_USER}/${PRIVATE_REPO}.git /tmp/plugin_library

# --- Step 5: Copy Plugins to Server ---
echo "INFO: Installing plugins..."

# Copy all shared plugins
echo "INFO: Copying shared plugins..."
cp /tmp/plugin_library/shared/*.jar /mnt/server/plugins/

# Copy server-specific plugins based on the NETWORK_SERVER variable
echo "INFO: Copying plugins for server type: ${NETWORK_SERVER}..."
# The [ -d ... ] check ensures this step doesn't fail if a folder doesn't exist
if [ -d "/tmp/plugin_library/${NETWORK_SERVER}" ]; then
    cp /tmp/plugin_library/${NETWORK_SERVER}/*.jar /mnt/server/plugins/
fi

# --- Final Cleanup ---
echo "INFO: Cleaning up temporary files..."
rm -rf /tmp/plugin_library

echo "SUCCESS: Server and plugin installation is complete."
